Prebon sees the first set of bots rush out of the Iron Fist. "ATTACK" he ye=
lls pointing in the direction of the enemy. He picked up his constrictor ri=
fle and fired five shots at Sharpedge.
He pulled the pin on a flash grenade=
 and tossed it in front of the counterattackers. The flash was harmless it =
was designed to disrupt thier sight long enough to advance.

Hammer Ducks b=
ehind cover as the missles hit. He pops his head up just on time to feel a =
series ofpistol shots hit him in the chest to stomach region. He fell back =
behind the cover that had saved him from the missles. 

Blaze fired her dis=
rupror again, this time at the area of the ship that held the power unit. W=
ithout power the ship would be defenseless.

Bullit fired two missles from =
his wrist, and five imploder blasts from his rifle at Godfather. The blasts=
 would destroy a target from the outside in.
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, Dece=
mber 26, 2000 8:32 AM
  Subject: Re: Washington crosses the Delaware


  ::=
:Sharpedge/Godfather::: 

  ::they get out of the CR chambers:: 
  Sharpedg=
e: Damn, we were in there WAAY to long!  Lets get back to the battle! 
  ::=
They feel the shots on the base:: 
  Godfather: Yo dude, i think we should =
stay here and fight these dopes! 
  Sharpedge: Good idea! 
  ::They run out=
 to the battle.  Sharpedge fires 2 missles at Hammer and 
  Godfather fires=
 15 shots from each pistol at Hammer:: 
        eGroups Sponsor
